title: The Beginning
desc: A group of friends founded a Commodore 64 Demo group called "Spacexpress".

title: Another group established
desc: To childhood friends started a second group called "Danish Demo Duo".

title: New group established
desc: The group expanded and changed name to "Dexion".

title: Peak of our C64 era
desc: Released many technical masterpieces, pushing the 64 to its absolute limits with innovative coding techniques and releasing stunning music.

title: First Demo Party
desc: Our first C64 demoparty was held with success at a local school in Nykøbing Sj.

title: Amiga Transition
desc: Expanded to Amiga while maintaining C64 releases. Both our C64 Amiga releases gave us international attention.

title: Golden Years
desc: Peak of our creativity. Released multiple award-winning demos including "Megademo 1" and "Megademo 2". Winning competition at Meetings.

title: Biggest Demo Party
desc: We held our biggest demo party in Odense Denmark. Dexion X-Mas Party 1990 with 800 participants. And the biggist prizes so far. Amiga first prize was US $1000 and C64 first prize was US $500.

title: Final Release
desc: Released our swan song "Farewell to Silicon" — a tribute to the machines and community that shaped us. Members moved to PC and professional careers.
